hero.headline: Every NYC Skate Shop. One Place.
hero.subheadline: Your complete guide to NYC's skateboard scene ‚Äî shops, gear, events, and more across all five boroughs.

board_of_the_week.blurb: A timeless classic from one of NYC's most legendary shops. The Labor Classic Logo deck is the real deal ‚Äî pressed in the USA with premium North American maple.

about.title: About Board Room NYC
about.text: Board Room NYC exists to keep NYC's skate shop culture alive. We're not Amazon ‚Äî we're a directory that connects you directly with the independent shops that make this city's skate scene what it is. Every purchase you make through a local shop supports the community, the riders, and the culture. Shop local. Skate local.

newsletter.heading: Stay in the Loop
newsletter.subheading: Weekly drops, shop events, and NYC skate news. No spam, ever.
